snippet.title: Surgeon Simulator 2: Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time to reveal the gameplay in Surgeon Simulator 2!

Pre-order Surgeon Simulator 2 now to unlock a selection of time-exclusive cosmetics and pre access from Aug 21st. Out August 27th 2020, only on the Epic Store: https://bossa.games/30BNqy2

The physics-based pandemonium returns with Surgeon Simulator 2, the gut-busting sequel to the original operation sim. From 4-player co-op to the all-new Creation Mode, explore an entire medical facility of wonder in this *fully* fleshed-out sequel!
